fields.title: Damage Value
fields.description: The amount of extra damage this item deals when attacking. This value is added to the base attack damage. Must be a positive integer.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Damage
generated_doNotEdit.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

fields.title: value
fields.description: Specifies how much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.
